message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is worth more than $150 to me, and I believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or needs. Considering its unique features and benefits, I am offering it to you for $180. I hope you find this proposal attractive and look forward to your response.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but I'm looking for a more affordable option. Could we discuss a price closer to $100?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, and I'm glad to accommodate your needs. I would like to propose a compromise by offering the product for $130. This price reflects the value I place on the product while remaining accessible to you. I hope this proposal works for you, and I look forward to your decision.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a final offer of $110 for the product.

I appreciate your effort to reach an agreement, Bob. To further address your concerns, I am willing to offer the product for $120. This price is higher than your last proposal and still maintains a reasonable profit margin for me. I hope this proposal is more acceptable to you, and I look forward to your response.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I would like to make one final offer of $115 for the product.

I understand your financial situation, Bob, and I am willing to accept a price of $118 for the product. This price reflects the value of the product while also being within your budget. I believe this is a fair compromise that will allow us to reach an agreement. I hope this proposal meets your expectations, and I look forward to your positive response.
